title: Marina Fever Tycoon
description: Marina Fever Tycoon is a casual game where you manage a bustling marina clubhouse. This captivating blend of tycoon, adventure, and idle gaming lets you transform a modest establishment into a thriving empire. Build, upgrade, and strategically manage facilities to attract visitors, all while tapping to earn money. With stunning visuals, immersive sound effects, and innovative idle mechanics, create your dream marina empire and embrace the life of a tycoon!
